CustomField.description: Button to open the Expense Claim Manager
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("/lightning/cmp/tc9_et__ExpClaimManager?c__recordId=" + Id, IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+ If( Text ( tc9_et__Approval_Status__c ) = "Submitted" , "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Blue.png", If( Text ( tc9_et__Approval_Status__c ) = "Rejected" , "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Grey.png", If( AND(Text ( tc9_et__Approval_Status__c ) = "Approved", text(tc9_et__Transaction_Creation_Stage__c) != "4"), "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Green.png", If( AND(Text ( tc9_et__Approval_Status__c ) = "Approved", text(tc9_et__Transaction_Creation_Stage__c) = "4"), "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Red.png", "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Orange.png" ) ) ) ),"Manager"),"_parent")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Button to open the Expense Claim Manager
CustomField.label: Expense Claim Manager
